mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_cart (board_no, user_email, quantity) VALUE (#{boardNumber},#{userEmail},#{quantity})
mapper.select: select cart.board_no, cart.no, total_price, title, cart.user_email, cart.quantity from shop_cart as cart inner join shop_board as board on cart.board_no=board.no where cart.user_email like #{userEmail} order by cart.no desc
mapper.delete: delete from shop_cart where user_email=#{userEmail} and board_no=#{boardNumber}
